price: 86. Wuxuu yidhi: Waxaan uun u sheegan baahideyda iyo walbahaarkeyga Alle, waxaana ka ogahay xagga Alle29 wax aydaan ogayn.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَشۡكُواْ بَثِّي وَحُزۡنِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: 29.Uma uusan muujin inta ay gaarsiisan tahay ka xumaantiisa ama cadhadiisa waxa uu ka shakiyey ilmahiisa inay faleen, wuuse iska samrayey, isagoo isku halleynaya Alle oo ka doonaya kaalmo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā ashkū bathī waḥuz'nī ilā al-lahi wa-aʿlamu mina al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
